com.esri.mo2.client.aims
Class BaseFolderProxy

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.esri.mo2.client.aims.BaseFolderProxy
public class BaseFolderProxy
extends Object

BaseFolderProxy is used to obtain a folder object given a folder name and BaseEsrimap.

This class interacts with the following classes:

     - BaseEsrimap
     - FolderUtil
     - CategoryInfoDocElement
     - Folder

Example:


      BaseFolderProxy baseFolderProxy = new BaseFolderProxy(baseEsrimap, _folderName);
      baseFolderProxy.getFolder().getFolderItems().removeFolderItem("MyFolder");
